license.notes: SPIFFE/SPIRE is Apache-2.0. CNCF graduated. The Workload API proto definitions are the model source for workload identity entities. Portarium uses SPIRE as a deployment dependency for zero-trust mTLS between execution plane and edge gateways.

extraction.notes: Parse protobuf definitions to extract SVID, Bundle, JWTSVIDRequest entities. The Workload API (workload.proto) is the primary integration surface.
